pages.text: $(li)The Iron Ingot is a hard metal that can be obtained smelting an Iron Ore, slaying creatures as Husks, Zombies or Mimics or found in Loot Chests.$(br)$(li)This item can be used in multiple crafts in a Crafting Table.
